title: Need Help! How to change to new client?
body: When the notification for updating to the new client showed up, I declined. After my friend told me how great it was, I wanted to download it. But there appears to be no way to download from what I can see. Please help.

replies.body:
You can download the Beta Client at any time from your patcher, as it has a dedicated button for the upgrade:

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

Let me know if you run into any issues with the upgrade.
